successes.title: Shadowrun Online
successes.description: Experience Shadowrun with your friends and plenty of enemies in an action strategy game and determine the future of the 6th world!

Pledges.description: INNOCENT BYSTANDER --- Every journey begins with the first step... At this level you will receive a free SRO wallpaper for your desktop and a chance to be in the know. You also have our deepest gratitude for getting involved and caring about our project.

CITIZEN--- SPECIAL LAST 48HOUR OFFER
You will receive 14 DAYS PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION for the game (earning you extra Karma, Nuyen and Reputation), a free SRO wallpaper AND a DRM FREE downloadable version of our soundtrack!

GANGER --- You will receive EXCLUSIVE CLOSED BETA ACCESS from day one (though remember it IS a beta), a free SRO wallpaper PLUS 1 MONTH PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION (earning you extra Karma, Nuyen and Rep, so you can rise through the ranks with less work).

CAMPAIGN GANGER --- You will receive EXCLUSIVE CLOSED BETA ACCESS from day one, a free SRO wallpaper and a DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPY of the game FOR THE CAMPAIGN SERVER with no real money micro-transactions for any items that give an advantage in the game!

AWAKENED --- You will receive EXCLUSIVE CLOSED BETA ACCESS from day one, a free SRO wallpaper, PLUS a UNIQUE TALISMAN for protection on the streets (in-game) AND a 3 MONTH PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION (earning you extra Karma, Nuyen and Rep, so you can rise through the ranks with less work).

CAMPAIGN AWAKENED --- You will receive EXCLUSIVE CLOSED BETA ACCESS from day one, a free SRO wallpaper, PLUS a UNIQUE TALISMAN for protection on the streets (in-game) AND DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPY of the game FOR THE CAMPAIGN SERVER PLUS THE FIRST UPDATE.

RUNNER'S APPRENTICE --- You will receive EXCLUSIVE CLOSED BETA ACCESS  from day one, a free SRO wallpaper, a UNIQUE TALISMAN for protection on the streets (in-game), a 3 MONTH PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION, PLUS a pdf version of the official SRO CAMPAIGN BOOK for Shadowrun 4th edition AND highly useful in-game STARTER GEAR to help you survive on the street!

CAMPAIGN RUNNER'S APPRENTICE --- You will receive EXCLUSIVE CLOSED BETA ACCESS from day one, a free SRO wallpaper, a UNIQUE TALISMAN for protection on the streets (in-game), DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPY of the game FOR THE CAMPAIGN SERVER PLUS THE FIRST UPDATE, PLUS a pdf version of the official SRO CAMPAIGN BOOK for Shadowrun 4th edition AND highly useful in-game STARTER GEAR to help you survive on the street!

DECKER  --- IN-GAME ONLY REWARD TIER
You will receive EXCLUSIVE CLOSED BETA ACCESS from day one, the SRO wallpaper, a UNIQUE TALISMAN for protection on the streets (in-game), highly useful in-game STARTER GEAR to help you survive on the street AND a 6 MONTHS PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION

WELL DRESSED RUNNER'S APPRENTICE
The same cool rewards as the Runner's Apprentice 50$ tier PLUS a T-SHIRT AND an exclusive AUGMENTATION

ADD 15$ FOR INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING
THIS IS NOT PART OF ANY HIGHER TIER

CAMPAIGN DECKER --- IN-GAME ONLY REWARD TIER You will receive EXCLUSIVE CLOSED BETA ACCESS from day one, the SRO wallpaper, a UNIQUE TALISMAN for protection on the streets (in-game), highly useful in-game STARTER GEAR to help you survive on the street AND a DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPY of the game FOR THE CAMPAIGN SERVER PLUS THE FIRST TWO UPDATES!

CO-OP  --- You will receive EXCLUSIVE CLOSED BETA ACCESS for you and 3 OF YOUR FRIENDS from day one, a free SRO wallpaper and a 3 DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPIES of the game FOR THE CAMPAIGN SERVER! You will also be able to RESERVE A NAME for your crew!

CAMPAIGN WELL DRESSED RUNNER'S APPRENTICE
The same cool rewards as the CAMPAIGN Runner's Apprentice 50$ tier PLUS a T-SHIRT AND an exclusive AUGMENTATION

ADD 15$ FOR INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING
THIS IS NOT PART OF ANY HIGHER TIER

GANG LIEUTENANT --- You will receive EXCLUSIVE CLOSED BETA ACCESS from day one, the SRO wallpaper, a UNIQUE TALISMAN for protection on the streets (in-game), a 3 MONTH PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION, highly useful in-game STARTER GEAR to help you survive on the street, PLUS a PRINTED version of the official SRO CAMPAIGN BOOK for Shadowrun 4th edition AND you will receive an EXCLUSIVE AUGMENTATION for your character AND you will see YOUR NAME IN THE CREDITS of both the game and the campaign book, so you can brag to everyone about it!
PLEASE ADD $15 for international shipping.

CAMPAIGN GANG LIEUTENANT --- You will receive EXCLUSIVE CLOSED BETA ACCESS from day one, the SRO wallpaper, a UNIQUE TALISMAN for protection on the streets (in-game), a DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPY of the game FOR THE CAMPAIGN SERVER PLUS THE FIRST UPDATE, highly useful in-game STARTER GEAR to help you survive on the street, PLUS a PRINTED version of the official SRO CAMPAIGN BOOK for Shadowrun 4th edition AND you will receive an EXCLUSIVE AUGMENTATION for your character AND you will see YOUR NAME IN THE CREDITS of both the game and the campaign book, so you can brag to everyone about it! PLEASE ADD $15 for international shipping.

RUNNER --- You will receive EXCLUSIVE CLOSED BETA ACCESS, highly useful in-game STARTER GEAR to help you survive on the street, the SRO wallpaper, a pdf and a printed version of the official SRO CAMPAIGN BOOK for Shadowrun 4th edition, an EXCLUSIVE AUGMENTATION, your name in the credits, a UNIQUE TALISMAN for protection on the streets (in-game),PLUS a great POSTER of ORIGINAL SRO ART and a SIX MONTH PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION, 
PLEASE ADD $15 for international shipping.

RUNNER --- You will receive EXCLUSIVE CLOSED BETA ACCESS, highly useful in-game STARTER GEAR to help you survive on the street, the SRO wallpaper, a pdf and a printed version of the official SRO CAMPAIGN BOOK for Shadowrun 4th edition, an EXCLUSIVE AUGMENTATION, your name in the credits, a UNIQUE TALISMAN for protection on the streets (in-game),PLUS a great POSTER of ORIGINAL SRO ART and a BOXED COPY of the game FOR THE CAMPAIGN SERVER PLUS THE FIRST TWO UPDATES, PLEASE ADD $15 for international shipping.

WHIZ! --- DIGITAL ONLY REWARD TIER
You will receive ALL OF either the CAMPAIGN DECKER OR DECKER REWARDS
PLUS YOUR NAME IN THE CREDITS AND an EXCLUSIVE AUGMENTED REALITY in-game ICON broadcasting you as a premium backer in the game which allows access to in-game VIP clubs AND a total of FOUR CAMPAIGN UPDATES OR A 1 YEAR PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION (includes the Decker updates/subscriptions)
NOT INCLUDED IN ANY OTHER TIERS

SWAG BAG
All of the great rewards from either the GANG LIEUTENANT or the CAMPAIGN GANG LIEUTENANT PLUS the cool Shadowrun SWAG BAG to carry all the good stuff you are getting.
Add 15$ for international shipping.

VETERAN RUNNER --- You will receive EXCLUSIVE CLOSED BETA ACCESS, the SRO wallpaper, a SIX MONTH PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION, highly useful in-game STARTER GEAR, EXCLUSIVE AUGMENTATION, a pdf and a printed version of the official SRO CAMPAIGN BOOK for Shadowrun 4th edition with your name in the credits, your name in the game credits, a UNIQUE TALISMAN for protection on the streets (in-game), a great POSTER of ORIGINAL SRO ART. PLUS a 4 piece set of cool SRO MINIATURES, the GAME SOUNDTRACK, AND an EXCLUSIVE AUGMENTED REALITY in-game ICON broadcasting you as a premium backer in the game which allows access to in-game VIP clubs! PLEASE ADD $15 for international shipping.

CAMPAIGN VETERAN RUNNER --- You will receive EXCLUSIVE CLOSED BETA ACCESS, the SRO wallpaper, a DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPY of the game FOR THE CAMPAIGN SERVER PLUS THE FIRST TWO UPDATES, highly useful in-game STARTER GEAR, EXCLUSIVE AUGMENTATION, a pdf and a printed version of the official SRO CAMPAIGN BOOK for Shadowrun 4th edition with your name in the credits, your name in the game credits, a UNIQUE TALISMAN for protection on the streets (in-game), a great POSTER of ORIGINAL SRO ART. PLUS a 4 piece set of cool SRO MINIATURES, the GAME SOUNDTRACK, AND an EXCLUSIVE AUGMENTED REALITY in-game ICON broadcasting you as a premium backer in the game which allows access to in-game VIP clubs! PLEASE ADD $15 for international shipping.
CO-OP RUNNERS APPRENTICE! --- ALL DIGITAL REWARD TIER! Get the $50 or $55 reward tier (your choice) for you and 3 of your friends to slip back in to the shadows! (Not included in any other tiers)
T-SHIRT SET --- All of the great rewards from the 150 or 155 tier (your choice) PLUS ALL 3 T-SHIRTS. PLEASE ADD $25 for shipping.
HOODIE --- All of the great rewards from the 150 or 155 tier (your choice) PLUS an exclusive SHADOWRUN HOODIE in black with the stylish logo on the back. PLEASE ADD $25 for shipping.

GANG LEADER --- All of the great rewards above PLUS an exclusive SHADOWRUN HOODIE in black with the stylish logo on the back AND an EPIC ITEM NAMED AFTER YOU, for everyone to use in the game (If they earned it). Make yourself wanted by thousands of players! PLEASE ADD $25 for shipping.

CAMPAIGN GANG LEADER --- All of the great campaign server rewards above PLUS an exclusive SHADOWRUN HOODIE in black with the stylish logo on the back AND an EPIC ITEM NAMED AFTER YOU, for everyone to use in the game (If they earned it). Make yourself wanted by thousands of players! PLEASE ADD $25 for shipping.

GHOST IN THE MACHINE - ALL DIGITAL REWARD TIER!!!
This is for those who look primarily for a lifetime subscription and some added goodness!
You will receive EXCLUSIVE CLOSED BETA ACCESS, the SRO wallpaper, the in-game STARTER GEAR, EXCLUSIVE AUGMENTATION, your name in the game credits, an EPIC ITEM named after you, the UNIQUE TALISMAN, the GAME SOUNDTRACK as a download, the EXCLUSIVE AUGMENTED REALITY in-game ICON 
PLUS: THE LIFETIME PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION...so you will always be alive in the matrix...

CAMPAIGN GHOST IN THE MACHINE - ALL DIGITAL REWARD TIER!!! This is for those who look primarily for a lifetime subscription and some added goodness! You will receive EXCLUSIVE CLOSED BETA ACCESS, the SRO wallpaper, the in-game STARTER GEAR, EXCLUSIVE AUGMENTATION, your name in the game credits, an EPIC ITEM named after you, the UNIQUE TALISMAN, the GAME SOUNDTRACK as a download, the EXCLUSIVE AUGMENTED REALITY in-game ICON PLUS: a DIGITAL DOWNLOADABLE COPY of the game FOR THE CAMPAIGN SERVER PLUS ALL UPDATES ...so you will always be alive in the matrix...

SPECIAL REWARD --- All of the great rewards from the all digital $275 free-to-play tier PLUS an exclusive SHADOWRUN HOODIE in black with the stylish logo on the back, and the Collectible EXECUTIVE-LEVEL USB CARD. PLEASE ADD $15 for int. shipping.

SPECIAL CAMPAIGN REWARD --- All of the great rewards from the all digital $280 campaign tier PLUS an exclusive SHADOWRUN HOODIE in black with the stylish logo on the back, and the Collectible EXECUTIVE-LEVEL USB CARD. PLEASE ADD $15 for int. shipping.

ULTIMATE GHOST IN THE MACHINE - ALL DIGITAL REWARD TIER!!! This is a combination of the $275 and the $280 tier! Get all the great stuff from those tiers INCLUDING LIFETIME UPDATES FOR THE CAMPAIGN SERVERS and A LIFETIME SUBSCRIPTION ON THE FREE-TO-PLAY SERVERS!!! - see updated graphic chart for full details.

STREET LEGEND --- All of the above PLUS a LEGENDARY game item named after you AND a FULL SET of SRO MINIATURES. AND a TWO YEAR PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION.
PLEASE ADD $25 for international shipping.
STREET LEGEND --- All of the above PLUS a LEGENDARY game item named after you AND a FULL SET of SRO MINIATURES. AND a LIFETIME SUBSCRIPTION. PLEASE ADD $25 for international shipping.

CAMPAIGN STREET LEGEND --- All of the above PLUS a LEGENDARY game item named after you AND a FULL SET of SRO MINIATURES. a BOXED COPY of the game FOR THE CAMPAIGN SERVER PLUS ALL UPDATES. PLEASE ADD $25 for international shipping.

ULTIMATE STREET LEGEND --- This is a mix of the $500 and the $505 tier! Get all the great stuff from those tiers INCLUDING LIFETIME UPDATES FOR THE CAMPAIGN SERVERS and A LIFETIME SUBSCRIPTION ON THE FREE-TO-PLAY SERVERS!!! - and of course you can participate in the "MEET A LEGEND" runs - see updated graphic chart for full details.

MASTER FIXER --- All of the above including the MINIATURES, PLUS a LIFELONG PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION, AND your PORTRAIT as a CHARACTER for everyone to play, or as an NPC (depends on whether you would rather be famous or infamous) and the same portrait as an EXCLUSIVE PRINT, signed by the development team!

CAMPAIGN MASTER FIXER --- All of the above including the MINIATURES, PLUS a BOXED COPY of the game FOR THE CAMPAIGN SERVER PLUS ALL UPDATES, AND your PORTRAIT as a CHARACTER for everyone to play, or as an NPC (depends on whether you would rather be famous or infamous) and the same portrait as an EXCLUSIVE PRINT, signed by the development team!
